data.text: @theonlytinks Hi! It is properly working.  We kindly ask you to try again. We remain at your service.    ¨JT

@EnoDetah @EnoDetah, Please be so kind to share all your information about this issue through amcomplaint@aeromexico.com where we will be able to contact you provide a formal response. We re at your service. ST
Ocean so blue, I get lost in you. https://t.co/TCzkh5RjPz

We believe magic exists for two reasons:
1. True love.
2. Places like this. https://t.co/FsJy54Tye6
The best gift you can give your partner, is a lifetime of adventures. https://t.co/2BtgzGbZ2p
@ouestladiscoteq Be kind to share the booking references. *AR
The perfect place to start your love story on Valentine's day. https://t.co/PKgBaBL8pq
@f_lara07 Fernando, thank you very much for all your words. We will send your congratulations to our airport personal. *KR
Places like this make me believe that true love does exisit. https://t.co/YRzJI5rwQ4
All we really want is a love that reaches as far and deep as the most mysterious parts of the ocean. https://t.co/Yiay41g6wC
Romeo and Juliet had fair Verona. In Mexico, we have Guanajuato.❤️ https://t.co/85pjzVmpIW
February is here, so from now on we'll just be posting places to fall in love with. #CatchFlightsNotFeelings https://t.co/I0GeHP2yDT

Today is #DiaDeLaCandelaria in Mexico! It's tradition to celebrate by eating tamales with your family and friends. Here are some of the most famous types of tamales and where they're from! https://t.co/QLy8Pvf3Z3
Check-in doesn't have to be a hassle. We've made it super easy for you with our kiosks! https://t.co/w2J2DxL2Z6
You know Cancun, but have you heard of it's equally gorgeous cousin, Bacalar? https://t.co/fbsq1iElDC
@dani_oax We are sorry to hear that, please share with us your reservation code vía DM. *RG
Merida is the epitome of colonial charm mixed in with one of the most spectacular cuisine! https://t.co/fxBpSZM9NI
Ok, truth time. You either love these or hate them. Which is it? https://t.co/noHkusr5aU
You know you love traveling when this place starts to feel like home. https://t.co/5zMiVuERXs

@NelsonDeCaires Nelson, lamentamos que así lo consideres. Nuestros compañeros de equipajes se encuentran vía What's App, no obstante nos pondremos en contacto con ellos para verificar tu situación. Encontramos casos vinculados a una maleta dañada. En breve se pondrán en contacto contigo. *AR
There are views for days at the Tango capital of the world. https://t.co/xZNiTWbPs1
@NelsonDeCaires Nelson, por favor contáctanos a través de nuestro Whatsapp al +52 55 5133 4000 en donde con gusto un ejecutivo de equipajes te asistirá en nuestro chat en vivo. *HS
@NelsonDeCaires Hola Nelson, pro favor compartenos tu número de caso para verificarlo. *RG
If man wasn't mean to fly, then why is the view from above so beautiful? https://t.co/WUcidLxhOJ
Life isn't always rainbows and butterflies, but in Morelia, sometimes it is. https://t.co/MCLx1T36d7

Meet @AlanPingarron, one of the most successful opera singers in Mexico. We spoke with him in preparation for the Tenor Viñas contest in Barcelona. 
We're proud to be a supporter of Mexican talent! 
#MexicanosConAlas https://t.co/lbgicE430o
A palace fit for a Queen (or a tourist looking for a new adventure). https://t.co/9aNmJQJzTK
#DollyPartonChallenge ✈️ https://t.co/qgnLxlgTzk
@mchin36105382 Your comments have been shared with the corresponding area, in order to improve the service and avoid this kind of situation. *DR
One is not like the others. (Hint: Full-flat beds) https://t.co/N4oacTSAsI
@DinaSegoviano Dina, lamentamos los inconvenientes que esta situación ocasiona. Agradecemos tu comprensión. *BQ
They told me to follow my heart, and this is where mine led me. https://t.co/7IGcCd2pDA

Today, Captain Elizabeth Abadie Vazquez, our first female pilot, landed at the Mexico City airport for the last time as she retires after a career of 40 years with us. 

We are proud of her great accomplishment, and wish her all the best. https://t.co/MnePGrbe1E

data.text: @barretoadri Hola, por favor compártenos más detalles de lo sucedido. *HS
@callmeveronicaa Veronica, we inform you that through the mean mentioned you will receive information. You can also call us from USA 1-800-237-6639 or send an email to amluggage@aeromexico.com. *RG
@callmeveronicaa Hello Veronica, we ask you again to contact us via WhatsApp to the number 52 1 55 5133 4000 and write "help". Don´t forget to share your report number. *RG
Our Special Flight Sale is here! Visit our hub, the perfect blend of cosmopolitan city and colonial wonder. https://t.co/ALInpv06Cv
@samdelvalle Te reiteramos que ya no es posible, porque ya se encuentra en proceso de reembolso. Deberás esperar el tiempo indicado. Agradecemos tu comprensión. *DR
@samdelvalle Te compartimos el enlace https://t.co/WEJGRyKDTp, lo puedes verificar. *DR

@samdelvalle Todo esto es por cuestiones de seguridad, ya que como mencionamos en la web "previo a la salida de tu vuelo, te soliciten mostrar la forma de pago en original con identificación oficial del tarjetahabiente para liberar la reservación y autorizar la documentación al vuelo." 2/2
@samdelvalle Entendemos la situación, el boleto se encuentra en estatus NOGO, significa que no se puede usar y ya está en proceso de ser reembolsado. El monto se verá reflejado de 4 a 8 semanas. 1/2
@samdelvalle Comprendemos la situación, sin embargo, es el tiempo estimado para dicho proceso. *DR

@samdelvalle Samantha, comprendemos la situación. Como medida de seguridad, se tiene que confirmar el propietario de la tarjeta ya que no coincide con el pasajero. Debido a ello, el boleto será reembolsado a la misma forma de pago, tu banco confirmará la transacción. *DR
@samdelvalle Samanta, ¿Cuál es la clave de reserva? *HS
@callmeveronicaa Our luggage team will be glad to assist you through What's App. ÄR
@callmeveronicaa Please reply that message with the word: HELP

@callmeveronicaa Hi. Please send a message via WhatsApp, to the number 01 55 51 33 40 00. We have assistance from an executive, and you will be supported in a live chat. Please remember to write the word HELP, so that Aerobot can channel you with a specialist. *SM
Santiago de Chile has everything you're looking for. https://t.co/p1VTrNUpIh
This year, dare to explore a new destination. https://t.co/wiuWxZoZj2
@cozzylion CozzyLion, We appreciate your reference and be sure that we will verify this information. We are at your service. St
This gorgeous destination is everything it's made out to be and more. https://t.co/VPHBw5dqrf

@Izzy50928704 Gracias, por favor igualmente por DM pero a la cuenta de AM Escucha, compártenos imagen del pase de abordar del vuelo en el que no se respetó la clase Premier, para que podamos seguir con la investigación.    ¨JT

@Izzy50928704 Izzy, comprendemos que la experiencia que nos indicas, no es la que se esperaba al volar. Por favor, comparte la clave de reservación. Analizaremos el motivo por el cual se realizó el cambio. *SM
@Izzy50928704 Hola, Izzy. Por favor, coméntanos ¿cómo podemos brindarte asistencia? *SM
Sometimes all you need is a change in scenery. https://t.co/kBNEq8wgOo
Make exploring a brand new destination one of your new year resolutions! https://t.co/QVXZ9KTymH
@auhmandah None of the model MAX are flying, We do not have a date yet. As soon as we have news our customers will be notified. *HS
@auhmandah Hello, the Boeing 737-800 MAX is not operating at this moment. The aircraft used is Boeing 737-800 but not the MAX one. *HS
